title: Remove footer disclaimer from GutOptim landing page

requirements.text: Remove the product disclaimer text from the landing page footer (the paragraph starting with “Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration...”), while keeping the rest of the footer content (copyright and the caffeine.ai attribution link) intact.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer renders the disclaimer paragraph that begins with “Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration...”.
The footer still renders the existing copyright line and the “Built with … caffeine.ai” attribution link.
No other new disclaimer or replacement text is introduced elsewhere on the page as part of this change.
Footer spacing remains visually clean (no awkward extra gap where the disclaimer was removed).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths defined by the platform.
nonGoals: Do not change CTA links, header/navigation behavior, section content, or overall page layout beyond removing the disclaimer line(s).
Do not add or modify backend (Motoko) logic.
